testsuite.name: Directory Cleanup Tests

testcase.name: Deletes directories containing only ignored files (.DS_Store, Thumbs.db)
Deletes subdirectories containing only ignored files
Deletes empty parent directories up to library root
Stops at directory containing non-ignored files
Does not delete library root even if empty
Does not delete subdirectories containing real files
